stimulusHtml: Which of the following can be concluded from the data above?
choicesHtml: The base year for the price index was year 1.
The base year for the price index was year 3.
The economy was producing higher-quality goods and services in years 2 and 3 than in year 1.
The economy was experiencing inflation during years 2 and 3.
The economy was experiencing deflation during years 1, 2, and 3.
